TextLibrary.Text: The Pirates have been taken care of, Port of Elysia. So what can you tell me about the Trident ship?
The Pirates have been taken care of, Port of Elysia. So what can you tell me about the Trident ship?

The ship traveled on to the Polaris System, MRI ship. I would advise extreme caution however, it attacked and captured an even larger Trident ship in our system. This is why we no longer have a military presence.

The ship traveled on to the Polaris System, MRI ship. I would advise extreme caution however, it attacked and captured an even larger Trident ship in our system. This is why we no longer have a military presence.
So there are more than one of these creatures?
So there are more than one of these creatures?
We might be able to take down the smaller Trident ship, but I'm not certain about the big one.
We might be able to take down the smaller Trident ship, but I'm not certain about the big one.
We should keep following them. At the very least we can report their whereabouts to the MRI Council. Maybe this was what they intended us to do.
We should keep following them. At the very least we can report their whereabouts to the MRI Council. Maybe this was what they intended us to do.
